subject: Fac Support - Patel Engineering Teesta Project V- Package 6 - CAR
cc: International Facultative Team <Internationalfacultative@kenyare.co.ke>;	Kunal Khanna <kunal@uibindia.com>; Madhur Taksali <madhur@uibindia.com>;	"Anurag Patil" <anurag.patil@uibindia.com>; "Kshitija Khismatrao"	<kshitija@uibindia.com>; "Vartika Sharma" <vartika.sharma@uibindia.com>;	"Karan Kurlekar" <karan@uibindia.com>
body:
This Message originated from outside Kenya Re, be cautious with links and attachments.

________________________________


Dear Steve,

 

Hope you’re doing well.

 

We are pleased to approach you for FAC support as regards to the project policy of Teesta V Package 6, Modification of diversion tunnel into tunnel spillway arrangement.

 

Teesta V Package 6, Modification of diversion tunnel into tunnel spillway arrangement - Civil & HM works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC gate shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet concrete dyke and Enerty Dissipation arrangement), for Teesta-V power station, Sikkim 

 

Brief details are as below:

 

Insured

a) Principal: NHPC Limited - NHPC Office complex, sector-33, Faridabad ,(Haryana) – 121 003

b) Contractor: Patel Engineering Limited, Patel Estate Road, Jogeshwari (West) Mumbai-400102 

 

 

Policy Form

Contractors All Risk Insurance Policy:

Section 1 – Material Damage 

Section 2 – Third Party Liability (TPL)

 

 

Project Description

Teesta V Package 6, Modification of diversion tunnel into tunnel spillway arrangement - Civil & HM works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC gate shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet concrete dyke and Enerty Dissipation arrangement), for Teesta-V power station, Sikkim 

 

 

 

Project/Policy Period

From: Date  18 months from TBA

To: TBA (24:00:00 Hrs.),

Plus, 12 Months Maintenance Period

 

 

Risk Location

Teesta V Package 6, Power Station (510 MW) , Sikkim

 

 

 

Please find attached the following for your kind perusal and reference: 

1.	Draft RI slip
2.	Letter of Award

 

For your ease we have also attached Teesta V report for your review of NATCAT exposure etc.

 

We would request if you could please review and get back to us with your written line.

 

We look forward hearing back and should you have any queries, please feel free writing back to us.

 

Regards

Elcy

 

 

 

	
Elcy Mascarenhas
Asst.Vice President - Reinsurance 

     

 

	UIB Insurance Brokers (India) Private Limited 
Hubtown Solaris, 201, N.S Phadke Road,

Andheri -East, Near East-West Flyover, Mumbai - 400 069. India.
Direct Line: +91 22 6153 9042  | Switchboard: +91 22 6153 9000 | Mobile: + 91 9820208816

Facsimile :  +91 22 6153 9001  | Website: www.uibgroup.com      <https://eur05.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.za.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F0K2kCzmAyjSMo1r7IXh6t9_pbc%2F&data=05%7C02%7Ckhan%40kenyare.co.ke%7C8240f4eaf7cc421c182208ddf1decdf2%7C27d4cd7a28aa41579f5ad83fe33dbd04%7C0%7C0%7C638932661517910182%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ukz76jlmqrN59h5y0SsxWKsjuZRYhXV4idZWwiBUdPg%3D&reserved=0>   

	
	

Edme Insurance Brokers Limited, has acquired 100% stake in UIB Insurance Brokers (India) Private Limited (“UIB India”) and UIB India is no longer a part of UIB Group. We will continue to use the UIB brand name until we receive approval for merger from the relevant authorities. 

CIN: U66030MH2009PTC195794

IRDAI Licence No: 410 (Composite) – Valid until 29th March 2026
